alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:53PM EDT until August 05 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN ACCOMACK COUNTY... At 453 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Onley, or 10 miles northeast of Exmore, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Willis Wharf around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Locustville, Harborton, Melfa, Pungoteague, Painter, Tasley, Keller, Quinby, Wachapreague and Accomac. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
